Doc: Rodimus, come on, Team 1's in place!

He pressed on a bit faster.

Din=
obot, outside, was still meditating. He had captured both Trelos's
transmis=
sion and Hydras's answer. He smirked mentally. But he also
heard the shudde=
r, the barely perceptible trembling underground. The
base was being protect=
ed somehow. First generation inspiration?
Possibly, but that also meant he =
had to be ready.

He stood up, not yet taking a combat stance. He was still=
 waiting.
They are Maximals and wouldn't fire first after all.
